Description:
Please contact Craig Frost on 0413 018 033 to arrange a private inspection.
Frost Real Estate welcomes you to consider this property and its outstanding features.
Step inside to find an exceptionally well maintained and beautifully presented family home featuring four bedrooms, three living spaces, large kitchen, separate dining, two bathrooms, large shed, plenty of storage and undercover car parking. Situated on 721 sqm approx, this is an opportunity to own a traditional home with plenty of space for every member of the family.
Off the main entrance hallway is a comfortable living or sitting room which continues onto a generous dining and living area, providing the perfect open dual living zone for entertaining family and friends. Alternatively the sitting area may serve as a home office or child's play space, illustrating a very flexible floorplan.
The adjoining kitchen is designed with family in mind, offering plenty of bench space, ample storage behind timber cabinetry, pantry, gas cooktop, stainless steel appliances, meals area and backyard views. Accessible from the family living and the kitchen is the covered outdoor area with timber decking which enjoys rear garden views and overlooks level lawn, clothes line, concrete paving and large lock up shed.
Downstairs three bedrooms with robes (two with sliding robes) are serviced by the family bathroom complete with shower, bath, vanity basin and separate toilet. Upstairs, the main bedroom with plush carpet offers privacy and the convenience of an ensuite and walk in robe. The third living space or parents retreat upstairs is light and bright and features a full wall of robes for additional storage.
Close to the Northern Hospital and several bulk billing medical centres, South Morang & Epping Train Stations, Epping & Mill Park Secondary Colleges and several private schools, 100m from Meadow Glen Primary School, day care centres & pre-schools, Westfield Plenty Valley & Pacific Epping Plaza, Bunnings Mill Park and Bunnings Epping and easy access to the western ring road.
While every effort has been made to provide the correct description of the property and identify the properties features, we advise you to conduct an inspection of the property for your own satisfaction.
